keyword: calories in a costco chicken bake
title: Calories in a Costco Chicken Bake
meta_description: Discover calories in a Costco chicken bake, including full nutrition breakdown with protein, carbs, fat, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in a Costco Chicken Bake
assumptions: Standard Costco Chicken Bake: rotisserie chicken, mozzarella cheese, spinach, garlic, dough-wrapped and baked; approx. 570g per bake.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, batch, and exact recipe; check Costco packaging or app for latest info.

quick_answer.text: A Costco Chicken Bake contains about 750 kcal, 40g protein, and 70g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Half portion (eat only half the bake)

faqs.q: How many calories in a Costco chicken bake?
faqs.a: Approximately 750 kcal per full chicken bake.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a Costco chicken bake?
faqs.a: About 40g of protein from the chicken and cheese.

faqs.q: Are Costco chicken bakes high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1500mg sodium due to cheese and dough.

faqs.q: Can I customize a Costco chicken bake?
faqs.a: At the food court, options are limited, but you can request no cheese or add sauce.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in a Costco chicken bake?
faqs.a: It's pre-baked; reheating doesn't significantly change calories, but overcooking may dry it out.
